## Hi!

I'm Tina and I am a PhD student in the Department of Econometrics and Business Statistics at [Monash University, Australia](https://www.monash.edu/business/ebs) supervised by Professor [Dianne Cook](http://www.dicook.org/), Professor [Farshid Vahid-Araghi](https://research.monash.edu/en/persons/farshid-vahid-araghi) and Dr. [Jessica Leung](https://sites.google.com/view/jessica-leung/home?authuser=0). 

I am a member of [Monash NUMBATs](https://numbat.space/). I am currently working as a tutor in the Department of Econometrics and Business Statistics at [Monash University, Australia](https://www.monash.edu/business/ebs).
